comment: I didn't know until recently that she used to be a high-powered lawyer. That blows my mind. Like if she offered to be my lawyer, I'd be like "no, thanks, I'll take a public defender." At least ugly Greta comes off as semi-intelligent in the way she speaks. Megyn is always talking and flaring her nostrils in indignation.
